articles.title: LATAM POLITICS TODAY-Latin American leaders lament Abe assassination
articles.description: In Mexico, President Andres Manuel Lopez Obrador offered condolences in a news conference and in Brazil, an "outraged" President Jair Bolsonaro ordered three days of national mourning. The presidents of Argentina, Bolivia, Chile, Colombia, Ecuador, Guatemala, and Paraguay were also among global leaders offering condolences on Twitter Friday morning.
articles.content:

articles.title: Argentina turmoil sparks panic buying and price hikes
articles.description: Buenos Aires, Argentina—A political crisis in inflation-ravaged Argentina that was sparked by the economy minister’s resignation has spooked markets and generated fears resulting in panic buying and hasty price hikes, as the informal exchange rate soars.
articles.content:
By Sonia Avalos

articles.title: Meraxes Gigas, New Dinosaur Species With Tiny Arms Similar To T-Rex Discovered In Argentina
articles.description: A new giant carnivorous dinosaur species was discovered in Argentina on Thursday. This dinosaur had tiny arms and a massive head, similar to Tyrannosaurus rex.
articles.content: Palaeontologists discovered a new giant carnivorous dinosaur species on Thursday. The dinosaur species have been named 'Meraxes gigas' after a fictional dragon in the Game of Thrones book series. This dinosaur had tiny arms and a massive head, simila... [1669 chars]

articles.title: GRAINS-Wheat at 1-week high on Argentina crop woes, easing recession fears
articles.description: SINGAPORE, July 8 (Reuters) - Chicago wheat futures jumped 2% and touched a one-week high on Friday, building on the previous session's rally, as easing concerns over a global recession and worries over lower production in Argentina underpinned the market.Corn and soybeans rose for a third consecutive session.FUNDAMENTALS* The most-active wheat contract on the Chicago Board of
